mcq.statement: Choose the sentence that contains a grammatical error: Had she known about the meeting, she would have attended it, The committee have decided to postpone the event until next month, No sooner had they arrived than the ceremony began, It was he who made the final decision after much deliberation

options.a: Had she known about the meeting, she would have attended it
options.b: The committee have decided to postpone the event until next month
options.c: No sooner had they arrived than the ceremony began
options.d: It was he who made the final decision after much deliberation
